steps.name: CypherCommand
commands:
match (o:esco__Occupation)
where o.uri in ['http://data.europa.eu/esco/occupation/26171f39-e85a-448f-bd28-a73a5a99927f']
unwind o.skos__altLabel as altLabels
create (al:OccupationLabel:Resource {skos__prefLabel: altLabels, uri: "<<ContentApiPrefix>>/occupationlabel/" + apoc.create.uuid()})
create (o)-[:hasAltLabel]->(al)
